snippet.title: Fossil Echo - Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
The game has been Greenlit! See you on Steam :-)

Website: www.fossilecho.com
Twitter: @FossilEcho
Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=350592181
__________________

A platformer/adventure game about a boy and his journey to climb an immense tower.
Why, and how did he get there? What will he find at the top?
__________________
